<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we just need to synthesize an all-true mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Mask = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> &#42;VPMask = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vphistogramrecipe/#aa8f8009fac3925355595375f9d3f458f">getMask</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Mask = State.get(VPMask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Mask =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a40ed7274ff11f079e5b5eae34c818c51">CreateVectorSplat</a>(VTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype/#a59632c5deb0423a518ad984bdd04d41f">getElementCount</a>(), Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a029317f08710bd90d20e85bdacdca921">getInt1</a>(1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a subtract, we want to invert the increment amount. We may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add a separate intrinsic in future, but for now we&#39;ll try this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::Sub)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IncAmt = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a7704bf68951054ffeb3efe605750e2d9">CreateNeg</a>(IncAmt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Opcode == Instruction::Add &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;only add or sub supported for now&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have to take the &#39;vectorized&#39; value and pick the first lane.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Construct a vector GEP by widening the operands of the scalar GEP as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1997"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// necessary. We mark the vector GEP &#39;inbounds&#39; if appropriate. A GEP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1998"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// results in a vector of pointers when at least one operand of the GEP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1999"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is vector-typed. Thus, to keep the representation compact, we only use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vector-typed operands for loop-varying values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2002"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (areAllOperandsInvariant()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2003"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are vectorizing, but the GEP has only loop-invariant operands,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2004"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the GEP we build (by only using vector-typed operands for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop-varying values) would be a scalar pointer. Thus, to ensure we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// produce a vector of pointers, we need to either arbitrarily pick an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2007"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operand to broadcast, or broadcast a clone of the original GEP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here, we broadcast a clone of the original.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: If at some point we decide to scalarize instructions having</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       loop-invariant operands, this special case will no longer be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       required. We would add the scalarization decision to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2013"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       collectLoopScalars() and teach getVectorValue() to broadcast</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2014"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       the lane-zero scalar value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a926d7ce2143863b7a2afda0fca4d2b65">Ops</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  State.setDebugLocFrom(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vprecipebase/#a733c4c530159a8b86223376c0696430e">getDebugLoc</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We know that all PHIs in non-header blocks are converted into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// selects, so we don&#39;t have to worry about the insertion order and we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can just use the builder.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At this point we generate the predication tree. There may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplications since this is a simple recursive scan, but future</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimizations will clean it up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2152"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumIncoming = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblendrecipe/#a4f0a937b4e04952fc07607effb9866a7">getNumIncomingValues</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generate a sequence of selects of the form:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SELECT(Mask3, In3,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        SELECT(Mask2, In2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//               SELECT(Mask1, In1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      In0)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that Mask0 is never used: lanes for which no path reaches this phi and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are essentially undef are taken from In0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OnlyFirstLaneUsed = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vputils/#a5e3c306be8d629a994f3644765421d5f">vputils::onlyFirstLaneUsed</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Result = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> In = 0; In &lt; NumIncoming; ++In) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We might have single edge PHIs (blocks) - use an identity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;select&#39; for the first PHI operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;In0 = State.get(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblendrecipe/#a2019700bf97441cc4fcf162a09247210">getIncomingValue</a>(In), OnlyFirstLaneUsed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (In == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2169"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result = In0; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize with the first incoming value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Select between the current value and the previous incoming edge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2172"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// based on the incoming mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2173"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a> = State.get(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblendrecipe/#a26df1ec06cf75ead168070b305c1344d">getMask</a>(In), OnlyFirstLaneUsed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2174"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result = State.Builder.CreateSelect(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>, In0, Result, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;predphi&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  State.set(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, Result, OnlyFirstLaneUsed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2178"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2507"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By current pack/unpack logic we need to generate only a single phi node: if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a vector value for the predicated instruction exists at this point it means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the instruction has vector users only, and a phi for the vector value is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needed. In this case the recipe of the predicated instruction is marked to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// also do that packing, thereby &quot;hoisting&quot; the insert-element sequence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, a phi node for the scalar value is needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (State.hasVectorValue(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpuser/#a6e1b252a9bbdc1a440fb57a6257b97f4">getOperand</a>(0))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;VPhi = State.Builder.CreatePHI(IEI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertelementinst/#a49230ece74a48a27fb2bb1a4928b6e29">getType</a>(), 2);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (State.hasVectorValue(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2521"><span class="doxyHighlight">      State.reset(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, VPhi);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2523"><span class="doxyHighlight">      State.set(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, VPhi);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must use intrinsics to interleave.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2895"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;WideVecTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype/#ac423a4165a8f57cd2865ef33dd9be484">VectorType::getDoubleElementsVectorType</a>(VecTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2896"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a80eec4efbded89b11092babf42a65b82">CreateIntrinsic</a>(WideVecTy, Intrinsic::vector&#95;interleave2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2897"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   Vals,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2898"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;FMFSource=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, Name);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2899"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2900"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fixed length. Start by concatenating all vectors into a wide vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2902"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;WideVec = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4288169d91ab0f0f01405115fd2931a7">concatenateVectors</a>(Builder, Vals);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2908"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2909"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2910"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to vectorize the interleave group that \\p Instr belongs to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2911"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2912"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E.g. Translate following interleaved load group (factor = 3):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2913"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   for (i = 0; i &lt; N; i+=3) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2914"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     R = Pic&#91;i&#93;;             // Member of index 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2915"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     G = Pic&#91;i+1&#93;;           // Member of index 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2916"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     B = Pic&#91;i+2&#93;;           // Member of index 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2917"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ... // do something to R, G, B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2918"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2919"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2920"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %wide.vec = load &lt;12 x i32&gt;                       ; Read 4 tuples of R,G,B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2921"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %R.vec = shuffle %wide.vec, poison, &lt;0, 3, 6, 9&gt;   ; R elements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2922"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %G.vec = shuffle %wide.vec, poison, &lt;1, 4, 7, 10&gt;  ; G elements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2923"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %B.vec = shuffle %wide.vec, poison, &lt;2, 5, 8, 11&gt;  ; B elements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2924"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2925"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Or translate following interleaved store group (factor = 3):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2926"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   for (i = 0; i &lt; N; i+=3) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2927"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ... do something to R, G, B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2928"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Pic&#91;i&#93;   = R;           // Member of index 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2929"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Pic&#91;i+1&#93; = G;           // Member of index 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2930"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Pic&#91;i+2&#93; = B;           // Member of index 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2931"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2932"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2933"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %R&#95;G.vec = shuffle %R.vec, %G.vec, &lt;0, 1, 2, ..., 7&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2934"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %B&#95;U.vec = shuffle %B.vec, poison, &lt;0, 1, 2, 3, u, u, u, u&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2935"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %interleaved.vec = shuffle %R&#95;G.vec, %B&#95;U.vec,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2936"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        &lt;0, 4, 8, 1, 5, 9, 2, 6, 10, 3, 7, 11&gt;    ; Interleave R,G,B elements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2937"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   store &lt;12 x i32&gt; %interleaved.vec              ; Write 4 tuples of R,G,B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2938" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpinterleaverecipe/#ab0d48fabf61af227821d568b1c3aa4ca"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpinterleaverecipe/#ab0d48fabf61af227821d568b1c3aa4ca">VPInterleaveRecipe::execute</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vptransformstate">VPTransformState</a> &amp;State) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2939"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!State.Lane &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Interleave group being replicated.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interleavegroup">InterleaveGroup&lt;Instruction&gt;</a> &#42;Group = IG;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2941"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Instr = Group-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interleavegroup/#a8ceaf9f0ed35c1a277261b29c97e4c95">getInsertPos</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2942"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prepare for the vector type of the interleaved load/store.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InterleaveFactor = Group-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interleavegroup/#a46f3b431a3121fdf53608a283bf4efec">getFactor</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype/#a861be1e2092622462053c6d31dddbfd5">VectorType::get</a>(ScalarTy, State.VF &#42; InterleaveFactor);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2947"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2948"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: extend the masked interleaved-group support to reversed access.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2950"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!BlockInMask || !Group-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interleavegroup/#a776b9e4e25dda6aff28a94e69a7533e6">isReverse</a>()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2952"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2953"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> &#42;Addr = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpinterleaverecipe/#a836a687c8159f9f598942689cf10f1ec">getAddr</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(ResAddr))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2956"><span class="doxyHighlight">    State.setDebugLocFrom(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getDebugLoc());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the group is reverse, adjust the index to refer to the last vector lane</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instead of the first. We adjust the index from the first vector lane,</span></CodeLine>
